title: Bible Narrative and Physical Data Interplay into Meaningful Faith: Tom Holland on Unbelievable
description:
Tom Holland's journey in relationship with the Bible has been absolutely fascinating to follow. He checks in Justin Brierley and author Andrew Allerton whose book he endorsed. This deserved the full commentary treatment. 

Tom Holland on @Unbelievable? with Justin Brierley and Andrew Ollerton https://youtu.be/f2_W6eCijV4

Tom Holland Revolutionary https://amzn.to/3nTmpzw

Annie Dillard Crash Helmets for Worship https://paulvanderklay.me/2012/06/07/annie-dillard-quote-on-crash-helmets-needed-for-worship/

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/TNWnRpKe

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

My Substack https://paulvanderklay.substack.com/

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here.
